sentences.sContent: Then one day an astronomer came to the village.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then one day an astronomer came to the village.
sentences.sCn: 终有一日，村子里来了一个天文学家。

sentences.sContent: The astronomer presented a new concept of the beginning of the universe.
sentences.sContent_eng: The astronomer presented a new concept of the beginning of the universe.
sentences.sCn: 这位天文学家提出了一个宇宙起源的新概念。

sentences.sContent: "I think we've made a crucial step towards finding if there is life out there, " said Amaury Triaud, one of the study authors and an astronomer at the University of Cambridge.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I think we've made a crucial step towards finding if there is life out there, " said Amaury Triaud, one of the study authors and an astronomer at the University of Cambridge.
sentences.sCn: 该项研究作者之一、剑桥大学天文学家阿莫里·特里奥表示说：“我认为我们在发现是否存在地外生命方面走出了至关重要的一步。

words.tran: 天文的，天文学的；极大的
天文学上地；宇航学地；天体地
太空航行；[航] 天文导航

trans.tranOther: a scientist who studies the stars and  planet s
